meta.name: theme-color

p.a: Discover more about our Business School

li.a: The University of Europe for Applied Sciences (UE)

div.p: Try our new Career Finder tool.

img.alt: International student looking at smart phone
img.title: International support

div.p: Moving to a new country can be daunting. We make sure you feel welcome.
Try our new career pathway selector.
Understanding the SQE and what it means for me.

div.strong: Your successful career starts here with Clearing. Call us

div.p: Whoops… Sorry, this page doesn’t exist.

div.class: p-4 mb-3 mb-md-4 rounded two-column-push__item position-relative rounded-sm-0 bg-color--ulaw-frost
div.p: We have a wide range of both undergraduate and postgraduate courses for you to choose from

div.class: p-4 mb-3 mb-md-4 rounded two-column-push__item position-relative rounded-sm-0 bg-color--ulaw-frost
div.p: Choose from our many campuses and partnership colleges

div.class: p-4 mb-3 mb-md-4 rounded two-column-push__item position-relative rounded-sm-0 bg-color--ulaw-frost
div.p: Explore your next steps with the University of Law

div.class: footer__copyright col-12 col-lg-8 offset-lg-3 order-2 order-md-1 pt-3 pb-md-3
div.p: © 2025 The University of Law. All rights reserved.

div.class: footer__cookies col-12 col-lg-8 offset-lg-3 order-1 order-md-2 pb-3 pt-md-3
col col-12 col-md-6 order-1 order-md-2 text-md-right
